GenAiFunction.description:
Use this action when the user provides a request that includes a product name (such as a medical device) and a quantity they want to order or inquire about.
Pass the user's full input message to the prompt template as the "user_input" parameter.
The prompt will return a JSON object with the fields: - "Product": the name of the product (e.g., "MRI Machines") - "Quantity": the number of units requested (as a string or number)
Only use this action if both product and quantity appear to be mentioned in the user's message. If the information is incomplete or ambiguous, prompt the user for clarification before calling the template.
